entry.title: Our paper is accepted in spin’25!

link.title: Our paper is accepted in spin’25!

entry.content: Nice to have our paper Accelerating CAR-based Model-Checking with Multiple Unsatisfiable Cores accepted for publication in SPIN’25. Thanks to all the collaborators! See you in Canada!
entry.summary: Nice to have our paper Accelerating CAR-based Model-Checking with Multiple Unsatisfiable Cores accepted for publication in SPIN’25. Thanks to all the collaborators! See you in Canada!

entry.title: Our paper is accepted in ieee tcad!

link.title: Our paper is accepted in ieee tcad!

entry.content: Nice to have our paper Revisiting Assumptions Ordering in CAR-Based Model Checking accepted for publication in the IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems! Thanks to all the collaborators!
entry.summary: Nice to have our paper Revisiting Assumptions Ordering in CAR-Based Model Checking accepted for publication in the IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems! Thanks to all the collaborators!
